Web_Envelope.help: The Executioner's Mace can lob a modified Web Grenade. Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets in a wide area. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Slow
Web_Envelope.targetHelp: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Pulverize.help: You are capable of Pulverizing a foe with your Nullifier Mace dealing high damage, causing toxic damage over time. Pulverize will occasionally disorient foes as well. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Pulverize.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient
Pulverize.targetHelp: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Web_Cocoon.help: The Bane Mace can fire a more powerful version the common web grenade. The sinewy fibers of this grenade are strong enough to completely Hold one target. Targets able to resist the Hold are still likely to have their attack and movement speed dramatically slowed. Web Cocoon can also bring down flying targets and prevent foes from jumping. You must be level 41 and have one other Mace Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Long
Web_Cocoon.targetHelp: You have been caught in a Web Cocoon and are Held. You cannot move or fly and your attack and movement speed is reduced.

Focused_Accuracy.help: When this power is activated, the Villain and allies focus their senses to dramatically improve their accuracy. Additionally, Focused Accuracy increase the team's Perception, allowing to better see stealthy foes. It also grants resistance to powers that DeBuff Accuracy. Focused Accuracy is a toggle power and must be activated and deactivated manually. Like all toggle powers, while active, Focused Accuracy drains Endurance while active. You must be level 41 and have one other Mace Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow
Focused_Accuracy.shortHelp: Toggle: Team +To Hit, +ACC, +Perception, Res(DeBuff To Hit)

Summon_Tarantula.help: Black Scorpion has granted you an Toxic Tarantula for you to command. Weaver One developed the Tarantula Exoskeleton Armor, which so radically transforms an Arachnos troop that hardly anything human is recognizable. Your access to this Tarantula is very limited. You can only summon it once every 15 minutes and it will leave after 4 minutes, or if you exit a zone or mission. You must be level 44 and have two other Mace Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long
